Application modules¶

admin.py¶

Register models with the django admin utility.

For more information on this file, see https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/1.6/ref/contrib/admin/

forms.py¶

Define django forms used to validate input data in http requests.

For more information on this file, see https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/1.6/topics/forms/

models.py¶

Define the database schema using django models.

For more information on this file, see https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/1.6/topics/db/

tests.py¶

Unit tests for the python code.

For more information on this file, see https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/1.6/topics/testing/

urls.py¶

Register the application URLs with django.

For more information on this file, see https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/1.6/topics/http/urls/

views.py¶

Respond to HTTP requests in the django context.

For more information on this file, see https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/1.6/topics/class-based-views/

app.views.addComment(request)¶

Respond to an HTTP request to add a comment to an oligo, at the URL ...app/addComment

Parameters:
  • primer – oligo primer
  • rating (1 - 5) – user’s rating
  • comment – user’s comment
Returns:

new comment list
app.views.comments(request)¶

Respond to an HTTP request for an oligo’s comments, at the URL ...app/comments

Parameters:primer – oligo primer
Returns:comments
Returns:oligo primer
app.views.init(request)¶

Respond to an HTTP request for the initial app context, at the URL ...app/init

Returns:population totals
Returns:satellite array names :return: satellite family names
Returns:total number of oligos in the database
app.views.oligos(request)¶
Respond to an HTTP request for filtered oligos, at the URL ...app/oligos
We assume the data from the client is valid
Parameters:
  • family – satellite family, if absent, no filtering on this
  • chr – human chromosome, if absent, no filtering on this
  • population – human population, if absent, no filtering on this
  • array – array name, if absent, no filtering on this
  • primer – oligo primer substring search
Returns:

filtered oligos rows
Returns:

total number of matches found in the database
app.views.populations(request)¶

Respond to an HTTP request for an oligo’s population counts, at the URL ...app/populations

Parameters:primer – oligo primer
Returns:population counts for the oligo
Returns:oligo primer
